statements: DELETE FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE device_id = 100 AND metric_name = 'latency';
DELETE FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE device_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'latency' OR metric_value > 50;
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'server' AND description LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM network_metrics WHERE id = 1 AND metric_name = 'Latency';
DELETE FROM anomaly_events WHERE device_id = 201 AND severity = 'High';
